attributes.action: initiate legislation to ban steering column locks on road vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recent cases of runaway cars have highlighted the folly of fitting steering column locks. In an emergency, the obvious action is to switch off the car's ignition but drivers are deterred from doing this for fear that the steering will lock. Steering column locks are a serious hazard and should be banned immediately.
